titles.title: A resolution recognizing the accomplishments and commemorating the numerous achievements and contributions of the Alaska Native people over the past 40 years.

vote.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment and with a preamble by Unanimous Consent.

bill.summary: 12/17/2011--Passed Senate without amendment. Recognizes: (1) December 18, 2011, as the 40th anniversary of the original enactment of the Alaska Native Claims Settlement Act; and (2) the educational, economic, political, and cultural contributions of Alaska Natives over the past 40 years.
